description:
Aaron Garrett Law is a solo law firm located in Albuquerque, New Mexico. We focus on workers' compensation and personal injury law. 

Proud To Be Your Local Law Firm

At Aaron Garrett Law, we are proud to say that we serve the community in which we live. Attorney Aaron Garrett was born and raised in Albuquerque. When he graduated from the University of New Mexico School of Law, he worked as a lawyer for one of the three largest insurance defense firms in the state â€” experience that is invaluable when building your cases against them. 

Personal injuries affect your physical, emotional and financial health. Although it is right there in the name, the personal aspect gets lost at many law firms today. Not at ours. We care equally about your experience with us as the compensation we obtain for you. 

When you have been injured in an automobile collision, slip-and-fall or workplace accident, we encourage you to call us immediately with your questions. Do not assume that the pain will go away or that the insurance company will pay you the money you need to recover. We can help you understand your rights and protect your claim. 

Call our law firm to schedule your free consultation with attorney Aaron Garrett. We are always willing to arrange to meet you at home or in the hospital.
